description: This file defines an AI-powered competitor analysis agent that utilizes search, scraping, reasoning, and analysis tools to perform comprehensive market intelligence tasks. It includes setup of the agent, tools, instructions, and a detailed template for generating competitive analysis reports.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class for creating an AI agent with specified models, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: FirecrawlTools
classes.description: Tools for web search, crawling, and content mapping.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for advanced reasoning and analysis within the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and output a response based on a prompt, with options for streaming and full reasoning display.
